unnormalised: ## Are Exam Prep Apps Actually Useful, Yaar? Asking for a friend! (Education Technology)
normalised: Are Exam Prep Apps Actually Useful, Friend? Asking for a friend! (Education Technology)

unnormalised: Okay, so my friend Priya is freaking out about her IIT-JEE prep. Finals are looming, 22/12/2023 is staring her in the face, and she's basically mainlining chai and revision notes at this point. She asked me about exam prep apps, like are they actually helpful or just another time-waster distracting from the good old NCERT books?
normalised: Okay, so my friend Priya is freaking out about her I I T-J E E prep. Finals are looming, twenty second december two thousand and twenty three is staring her in the face, and she's basically mainlining chai and revision notes at this point. She asked me about exam prep apps, like are they actually helpful or just another time-waster distracting from the good old N C E R T books?

unnormalised: I remember back in my day (this makes me sound so old!), we just had those bulky MTG books and endless coaching classes at Allen in Kota. Now, kids have everything on their phones! But does that translate to better scores?
normalised: I remember back in my day (this makes me sound so old!), we just had those bulky M T G books and endless coaching classes at Allen in Kota. Now, kids have everything on their phones! But does that translate to better scores?

unnormalised: I'm seeing apps promising things like personalized learning paths, mock tests that feel like the real thing (even with the pressure cooker anxiety!), and instant doubt solving. They even claim to optimize your study time, which sounds amazing considering Priya is pulling all-nighters till 03:00 hrs.
normalised: I'm seeing apps promising things like personalized learning paths, mock tests that feel like the real thing (even with the pressure cooker anxiety!), and instant doubt solving. They even claim to optimize your study time, which sounds amazing considering Priya is pulling all-nighters till three o'clock.

unnormalised: Has anyone actually used these apps for serious exams like NEET, CAT, or even UPSC? Did it really help improve your rank or score? Any app recommendations? Or should she just stick to the tried and tested method of religiously solving past papers and praying to Ganpati Bappa before the exam on 16/05/2024?
normalised: Has anyone actually used these apps for serious exams like N E E T, C A T, or even U P S C? Did it really help improve your rank or score? Any app recommendations? Or should she just stick to the tried and tested method of religiously solving past papers and praying to Ganpati Bappa before the exam on sixteenth may two thousand and twenty four?

unnormalised: Also, which app features are actually worth paying for? Some are charging a bomb - like Rs. 5000 per month! That's almost what my entire college mess cost! Give me the real scoop, Quora fam! What worked (or didn't work) for you? Let’s help Priya out! She needs to ace this exam, and I need to stop hearing her complain at 09:00 hrs every morning!
normalised: Also, which app features are actually worth paying for? Some are charging a bomb - like rupee five thousand per month! That's almost what my entire college mess cost! Give me the real scoop, Quora fam! What worked (or didn't work) for you? Let’s help Priya out! She needs to ace this exam, and I need to stop hearing her complain at nine o'clock every morning!
